meanings.definition: Of or relating to oak trees.
meanings.sent1: The quercine leaves rustled in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The forest had a quercine scent after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel built a quercine-themed nest for winter.
meanings.sent4: Her strength was as sturdy as a quercine trunk.
meanings.sent5: The quercine bark was rough to the touch.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of oak trees.
meanings.sent1: The table was made of quercine wood.
meanings.sent2: Her voice had a quercine quality, deep and rich.
meanings.sent3: The quercine door creaked like an old oak tree.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as solid as a quercine root.
meanings.sent5: The quercine color of the house blended with the forest backdrop.
